name: buildestate
description: BuildEstate - Premium Real Estate Platform with AI-Powered Insights

scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd admin && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build

author: Waqas Gul
